alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 2:50AM CST until January 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Winter Storm Possible Friday into Friday Night... .A winter storm is expected to impact the area Friday and Friday night with the potential for significant snow. Some changes in the storm track are possible, which could impact potential snow amounts. In addition, easterly winds gusting up to 30 mph could cause patchy blowing and drifting snow, especially in open areas. If you have travel planned on Friday or Friday night, monitor for forecast for updates, and be prepared for potentially hazardous conditions. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Mitchell, Floyd and Chickasaw Counties. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. Easterly winds gusting up to 30 mph may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
